sentence: Mandela Barnes has publicized a mid-December ALG Research survey that gives him a 40-11 lead over Milwaukee Bucks executive Alex Lasry in the August primary.
title: Morning Digest: Why the special election to succeed Devin Nunes could be an orphan race

sentence: Mandela Barnes (23 percent) and businessman Alex Lasry (13 percent) are the only two candidates in double-digits.
title: Twelve months that moved the Democratic Party left of Biden
